short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to read data from your d2l user table and download it converted into a CSV file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is strictly for D2L users to help them export tables easily with special table fields. Right click on table you are currently viewing on your D2L website and download as csv button will be visible on the opened menu.
